EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Atlanta - PAIR - Post Event - Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Start Your Advanced Analytics Journey with Pivotal!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for joining us at the Pivotal Analytics and Innovation Roadshow (PAIR). We hope you came away with a clearer understanding of how analytics and data science can deliver better outcomes for your stakeholders.
We’d like to speak with you in more detail about how to be successful with your own analytics initiatives. In the meantime, here are some resources to start you on your journey:
PAIR Presentations and other materials <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow-atlanta?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-pair-2017]]>
PAIR Workshop: Demos, code, and other technical resources:
- Airline Optimization problem code <[[https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B76GEdSVCa8NUGVmM0VUeERRV0U?usp=sharing]]>
- Stock prediction from 8-K reports demo <[[http://marketnlp.cfapps.pez.pivotal.io/]]> - MADlib documentation <[[http://madlib.incubator.apache.org/docs/latest/index.html]]> - Pivotal & R Guide <[[http://pivotalsoftware.github.io/gp-r/]]>
Please also take advantage of additional online resources for Data Science <[[https://content.pivotal.io/data-science?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-pair-2017]]> and Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-pair-2017]]>.
Now is the time to take the reins of your digital transformation. Let’s build something meaningful!
Sincerely, Patrick Gillis
